attributes.action: Remove GCSE and A-Levels for students who will take them in 2021
attributes.additional_details: Every other year group has had a undisturbed GCSE/A-Level and the students who will do them in 2021 will have had 6 months plus of key content missed out on which leave us at a massive disadvantage then fellow students and affect our future massively. Some students won’t be able to catch up as they may have learning difficulties and is unfair on those students. I believe to make it fair for us all is to remove the exams held in 2021.
attributes.background: We want the government to quite frankly remove GCSE’s and A-Levels for students who will take them in 2021 as lack of content and time away from school of which key content will have been missed resulting us a disadvantage then other year groups
